name: The Forbidden Quest
description:
When Abraham was young, he always dreamed of being a knight, especially because his father was a knight. When Abraham became 14, his father went on a deadly war battle between Dragkon and his army. Dragkon's army was the deadliest known to many worlds and was undefeatable, but that did not stop Abrahm's Father from trying to stop them. 

After many months of the deadly war taking place, Abraham’s father was killed in massive war between the knight army and the Dragkon army. Dragkon, the leader of the Dragkon army managed to deceive and brutally kill Abraham’s father in a lengthy battle. Dragkon also kept Abraham’s father’s 5 items, which were:

  • A Shield
  • A Bow and Arrow
  • A Ninja Star 
  • A Special Sword

 After Abraham heard about his father’s death and who killed him, he vowed to always take revenge on his father’s killer, save his town from Drakgon’s army and retrieve back his 5 items.

Do you think Abraham will succeed or fail in retrieving his father's lost 5 items ? only you can decide that
